table_caption: Demographic and clinical characteristics of the sample groups.1
table_foot: Values are displayed as mean ± SD. M = male, F = female. CDR = Clinical Dementia Rating Scale; MMSE = Mini-mental state examination; CAMCOG = Cambridge Cognitive Examination; CN = Cognitively Normal; MCI = Mild Cognitive Impairment; AD = Alzheimer Dementia;1Bonferroni correction;2Composite score with memory items from CAMCOG and MMSE.Post hoc analysis with Bonferroni correction:*AD vs CN, P<0.01; AD vs MCI, P<0.01; MCI vs CN, P<0.05;†AD vs CN, P<0.01; AD vs MCI, P<0.01; MCI vs CN, P>0.05;§AD vs CN, P<0.01; AD vs MCI, P<0.05; MCI vs CN, P>0.05;ΔAD vs CN, P<0.01; AD vs MCI and MCI vs CN, P>0.05.
